text: Mitrea is a Romanian surname. Notable people with this name include: *Bogdan Mitrea (born 1987), Romanian footballer *Dorina Mitrea (born 1965), Romanian- American mathematician *Ionuț Mitrea (born 1990), Romanian canoeist *Irina Mitrea, Romanian-American mathematician *Marius Mitrea (born 1982), Romanian rugby union referee *Miron Mitrea (born 1956), Romanian engineer and politician Category:Romanian-language surnames
title: Mitrea
